'''Crocodile Jerky''' is a limited [[food]] item that the player can obtain from [[Yuften]]'s Tent in the [[Tanit Camps]].

Crocodile Jerky increases the party's ATK by '''114''' for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Recipe==
* Currently, there is no recipe for '''Crocodile Jerky''', meaning the player cannot make Suspicious or Delicious variants of the dish, nor obtain any past the four in Yuften's Tent.

==Trivia==
* The item cannot be found in the [[Archive]].
